languages.text: "Человек-без-сердца мнил себя выше прочих. Верил, что его ремесло вознесло его. {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}И даже перед той{/d}, кто служит Неумирающему, он не отвел взгляд. Это было... дерзко. Неоправданно".

traits.locale_text: "Человек-без-сердца посмел не только дерзить ткачу Кровавой паутины, но и считал свои жалкие достижения в опытах с больными и усопшими триумфом над смертью".

languages.text: "The Heartless Man imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. He {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}did not even avert his gaze{/d} before a servant of the Undying One. It was... brazen. Unjustifiable."
languages.original_text: "Человек-без-сердца мнил себя выше прочих. Верил, что его ремесло вознесло его. {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}И даже перед той{/d}, кто служит Неумирающему, он не отвел взгляд. Это было... дерзко. Неоправданно".

traits.locale_text: "The Heartless One imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. Even before a servant of the Undying One, he did not avert his gaze. It was... brazen. For no good reason."

"The Heartless One imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. Even before a servant of the Undying One, he did not avert his gaze. It was... brazen. For no good reason."

"The Heartless Man imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. He {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}did not even avert his gaze{/d} before a servant of the Undying One. It was... brazen. Unjustifiable."

languages.text: « Persuadé que sa profession l'avait élevé, le Sans-Cœur s'est longtemps cru supérieur aux autres. Refuser de {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}détourner le regard{/d} face à un serviteur de l'Immortel était pour le moins... téméraire. Inexcusable. »
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. He {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}did not even avert his gaze{/d} before a servant of the Undying One. It was... brazen. Unjustifiable."

traits.locale_text: « Persuadé que sa profession l'avait élevé, le Sans-Cœur s'est longtemps cru supérieur aux autres. Refuser de {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}détourner le regard{/d} face à un serviteur de l'Immortel était pour le moins... téméraire. Inexcusable. »

languages.text: «El Despiadado consideraba que estaba por encima de los demás. Creía que su labor lo elevaba. Ni siquiera {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}apartó la mirada{/d} ante una sierva del Inmortal. Fue... osado. Injustificable».
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. He {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}did not even avert his gaze{/d} before a servant of the Undying One. It was... brazen. Unjustifiable."

traits.locale_text: «El despiadado consideraba que estaba por encima de los demás. Creía que su labor lo elevaba. Ni siquiera {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}apartó la mirada{/d} ante una sierva del Inmortal. Fue... osado. Injustificable».

languages.text: 「無情なる男は、自分が人より上だと思い込んでいた。自分の商売で階段を上ったものと信じていた。不死の者 の従者を前にしても{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}目を背けること{/d}はなかったの。なんという…傲慢。言い訳できないことよ」
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. He {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}did not even avert his gaze{/d} before a servant of the Undying One. It was... brazen. Unjustifiable."

traits.locale_text: 「無情なる者は、自分が人より上だと思い込んでいた。自分の商売で階段を上ったものと信じていた。不死の者 の従者を前にしても{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}目を背けること{/d}はなかったの。なんという…傲慢。言い訳できないことよ」

languages.text: “无心者以为自己高高在上，他以为他的职责让他获得了与众不同的地位。甚至当面对不死之神的仆人时，他都{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}不肯移开自己的目光{/d}，这样的行为实在是……厚颜无耻，不容维护。”
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. He {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}did not even avert his gaze{/d} before a servant of the Undying One. It was... brazen. Unjustifiable."

traits.locale_text: “无心者以为自己高高在上，他以为他的职业让他获得了与众不同的地位。甚至当面对不死之神的仆人时，他都{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}不愿移开自己的目光{/d}，这样的行为实在是……厚颜无耻，不容维护。”

languages.text: "Der herzlose Mann sah sich selbst über den anderen. Er glaubte, seine Aufgabe hätte ihn erhöht. Er {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}wendete nicht einmal seinen Blick ab{/d} vor einem Diener des Todlosen. Das war ... dreist. Nicht zu rechtfertigen."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. He {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}did not even avert his gaze{/d} before a servant of the Undying One. It was... brazen. Unjustifiable."

traits.locale_text: "Der Herzlose sah sich selbst über den anderen. Er glaubte, seine Aufgabe hätte ihn emporgehoben. Er {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}wendete nicht einmal seinen Blick ab{/d} vor einem Diener des Todlosen. Das war ... dreist. Nicht zu rechtfertigen."

languages.text: "Kalpsiz Adam, kendini diğerlerinden üstün görürdü. Mesleğinin kendisini yücelttiğine inanırdı. Ölmeyen'in bir hizmetkârının huzurunda bile {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}bakışlarını kaçırmazdı{/d}. Bakışlarına... Küstahlık hâkimdi. Gerekçesi yoktu."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man imagined himself to be above others. He believed his trade had uplifted him. He {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Distortion}did not even avert his gaze{/d} before a servant of the Undying One. It was... brazen. Unjustifiable."
